attributes.action: Revealed truth not theory to be taught in UK schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our innocent children's minds are being poisoned by the teaching of scientific theories in schools, rather than truth as revealed by God in his various books.
The government has made a start by using taxpayers money to fund religion in state schools, it must now go the whole way and teach our children that truth is God's and not means. Science is just a bunch of theories and taxpayers money should not be spent teaching it.
